name: Felix (RattleyCooper)
description:
Keyboard Controls:

  • W, A, S, D - Move character around screen.  A is left, D is right, S lets you duck through bridges and W lets you climb ladders.
  • E - Use switches, open chests & read signs
  • Space - Jump.  Hit space while in the air to jump again!
  • Control - Glide (balloons used as placeholder)
  • Shift - Air or ground dash

Xbox 360 Controller:

  • Left Joystick or D-Pad - Move character around.
  • X - Use switches, open chests & read signs
  • A - Jump
  • Right Trigger - Glide (balloons used as placeholder)
  • Right Bumper - Air or ground dash
